alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 14 at 1:25PM EDT until June 14 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Western Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 124 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles northwest of Blakely, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Edison and Arlington around 200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Colomokee, Harrisons Mill, Commissary Hill, Turman, Parksville, Ferrell Crossroads, Bluffton, Kolomoki Mounds Sp and Dickey. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
